text: The Treaty of Berlin was signed on June 14, 1889 between the United States, the British Empire, and the German Empire. == Terms == Based on the treaty, Samoa became independent and was allowed to choose its own king to rule it. However, the king would be advised by the United States, Great Britain, and Germany. In 1899, the treaty was replaced by the Treaty of Berlin (1899). == Other websites == *WHKMLA: History of Samoa, 1830-1899 Berlin 1889 Category:19th century in Oceania Category:History of Samoa Category:1880s in the United Kingdom Category:1889 in the United States
